textPlain: > https://github.com/iokasimov/ya/blob/main/Ya/Operators/Handc...This is the most arcane codebase I've seen. It's on par with co-dfns compiler. The frontend syntax also looks like a cross between Haskell and APL.
It's hard to understand his syntax, but I think he's arguing for something similar to the way that Rust uses From and Into.
> ho, he, yo, yo_, yo__, yo___, ... yo__________, haIs that some kind of meme I don't understand?I mean, it kinda looks like all the combinations of a bunch of operators that can be combined.
